TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit RegisterAssembly extends Microsoft.Build.Tasks.AppDomainIsolatedTaskExtension implements class System.Runtime.InteropServices.ITypeLibExporterNotifySink
Public Class RegisterAssembly Inherits AppDomainIsolatedTaskExtension Implements ITypeLibExporterNotifySink
type RegisterAssembly = class inherit AppDomainIsolatedTaskExtension interface ITypeLibExporterNotifySink

span.span: Implements the RegisterAssembly task.

summary.span: 使用项目文件中的 RegisterAssembly 元素创建和执行此任务。

span.span: Use the RegisterAssembly element in your project file to create and execute this task.

summary.span: 有关用法和参数信息，请参阅 [RegisterAssembly 任务](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ba5f19ac-6764-4d28-9b79-a86de58f8987)。

span.span: For usage and parameter information, see [RegisterAssembly Task](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ba5f19ac-6764-4d28-9b79-a86de58f8987).

remarks.format: ## Remarks Framework64 /\<版本 > / RegisterAssemblyTask 无法解析为 32 位组件已注册的 COM 对象库。Framework64/\/RegisterAssemblyTask cannot resolve a library of COM objects registered as 32-bit components. Framework /\<版本 > / RegisterAssemblyTask 无法解析为 64 位组件已注册的 COM 对象库。Framework/\/RegisterAssemblyTask cannot resolve a library of COM objects registered as 64-bit components. 例如，如果您注册的 COM 对象作为 64 位计算机上的 32 位组件调用 ClassLibrary1 库、 运行 Visual Studio 中，并将目标更改为 x64，生成将失败并出现以下错误：For example, if you register a library of COM objects called ClassLibrary1 as 32-bit components on a 64-bit machine, run Visual Studio, and change the target to x64, the build fails with the following error: `ClassLibrary1.dll is not a valid assembly`

summary.span: 获取或设置 RegisterAssembly 任务和 [UnregisterAssembly](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/04f549dd-3591-4dda-9c3a-cf6ede9df2c3) 任务之间的状态信息。

span.span: Gets or sets information about the state between the RegisterAssembly task and the [UnregisterAssembly](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/04f549dd-3591-4dda-9c3a-cf6ede9df2c3) task.

summary.span: 这样可以防止 UnregisterAssembly 任务尝试注销无法在 RegisterAssembly 任务中注册的程序集。

span.span: This prevents the UnregisterAssembly task from attempting to unregister an assembly that failed to register in the RegisterAssembly task.

value.span: 所需的状态信息UnregisterAssembly任务执行适当的清理操作。

span.span: The state information necessary for the UnregisterAssembly task to do proper clean-up.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个布尔值，该值指定任务是否在注册表中创建 codebase 项，该项指定未在全局程序集缓存中安装的程序集的文件路径。

span.span: Gets or sets a Boolean value that specifies whether the task creates a codebase entry in the registry, which specifies the file path for an assembly that is not installed in the global assembly cache.

value.span: 如果任务在注册表中创建 codebase 项，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the task creates a codebase entry in the registry; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果随后将安装要注册到全局程序集缓存中的程序集，则不应指定此选项。You should not specify this option if you will subsequently install the assembly that you are registering into the global assembly cache.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 记录一个错误，指示指定的程序集未注册为 COM 互操作在所有情况下。Logs an error indicating that the specified assembly is not registered for COM interop in all cases.

set: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置要从指定的程序集中生成的类型库。

span.span: Gets or sets the type library to generate from the specified assembly.

value.span: 要从指定的程序集中生成的类型库。

span.span: The type library to generate from the specified assembly.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 生成的类型库包含此程序集中定义的可访问类型的定义。The generated type library contains definitions of the accessible types defined within the assembly. 仅在下列情况之一成立时才会生成此类型库：The type library is only generated if one of the following is true: - 在该位置不存在该名称的类型库。A type library of that name does not exist at that location. - 类型库存在但早于正在传递的程序集。A type library exists but it is older than the assembly being passed in. 如果类型库比要传递的程序集新，则不会创建新的类型库，但仍会注册程序集。If the type library is newer than the assembly being passed, a new one will not be created, but the assembly will still be registered. 如果指定此属性，则它必须具有相同数目的项作为属性或该任务将失败。If this property is specified, it must have the same number of items as the property or the task will fail. 如果未指定输入，任务会默认使用程序集的名称，并将项的扩展名更改为 .tlb。If no inputs are specified, the task will default to the name of the assembly and change the extension of the item to .tlb.
